review: Absolutely love it!  Very user friendly.
author: msg03

review: Just purchased this and loving so far.....
author: S4 "S4"

review: Great product. Works great. All Prime shows are in high definition and also allows you to access your Prime Music. With Fire phone or Kindle Fire - allowd for mirroring with X-ray. Full integration of Amazon products. Highly recommend. Also Amazon has cleaned up the interface - looks beautiful.
author: Ken B.

review: Easy to setup and great listings provided, movies tv series etc.  Highly recommend
author: JGC

review: The best online video streamer for the money.  Got it on sale at Staples.com.  Well worth the price if you get it under $25.  Easy setup.  Not much memory to load apps, but enough content to satisfy your crave.Pro: Easy startup.  Menu and tabs are easy to understand and accessible.Con: no memory expansion.  USB outlet on device at a precarious position.  Need better design to support cable dangling.  No voice commands.
author: Paulie

review: Wonderful, cant' live without it.  I get all the movies and series instantly on my tv.  Easy to use.  Can't believe that little remote can do it all.  It streams perfectly in HD.  My TV has never looked so good.
author: RUSSELL CLAUNCH

review: East to set up. Love it!
author: Teresa Garcia

review: I got a really good deal on the Fire Stick, only $15. Next, I will have to subscribe to Amazon Prime for all the benefits.
author: Kobi Medina
